page.title: 17HUMBER GUARDIAN, HULL DOCK
page.content: The{Humber Guardian}is a small vessel that is based in King George Dock in Hull. It is responsible for the maintenance of all the lightships and buoys in the Humber Estuary. The lightships and buoys are used by the captains and pilots to help them steer a safe course through the navigable channels and thereby avoid the dangerous sandbanks. Each of the several hundred buoys is battery operated and is equipped with two spare bulbs that come on automatically should the first fail. Nonetheless, each buoy has to be serviced every nine months so the crew is kept busy. The{Humber Guardian}is equipped with advanced sonar, radar and computer systems so that the captain knows exactly where he is whatever the conditions.
